fields.name: Candle 1
fields.description: Experience the warm glow of the coast with nuanced scents of sun-kissed blossoms, creamy coconut, and salty ocean air.

fields.name: Candle 2
fields.description: A peppery blend of earthy spices surrounded by sweet amber and creamy sandalwood aromas.

fields.name: Candle 3
fields.description: This fragrance balances the rich scents of amber, vetiver and musk to perfectly capture the essence of a perfect evening by a warm fire.

fields.name: Candle 4
fields.description: The fresh scent of crisp, clean linen drying in a warm summer breeze.

fields.name: Candle 5
fields.description: A sun-drenched fragrance combination of melon, cucumber and crystalline pink quartz, traced with violet leaf and lemon blossom.

fields.name: Candle 6
fields.description: Green, floral scents are complemented by subtle hints of sweet lemon and grapefruit for a refreshing, herbal experience.

fields.name: Soap 1
fields.description: Treat yourself to a festive foam filled wash this Christmas, with this luxurious soap full of the uplifting scents of ginger and a blend of merry making Frankincense and Myrrh oils.

fields.name: Soap 2
fields.description: Jingle berry, jingle berry, jingle berry rock. What a bright time, it’s the right time, to wash the night away! With pure frankincense and myrrh essential oils to get your festive spirit on!

fields.name: Soap 3
fields.description: The tale of two superstars; strawberry and banana, whisked together in a milkshake inspired soap cake and combined with the power of pure ylang ylang and rose essential oils to make you feel like a VIP!

fields.name: Soap 4
fields.description: A softening blend of body smoothing Raspberry soap and luxurious Bergamot and Mandarin essential oils to leave you fruity scented and moisturised.

fields.name: Soap 5
fields.description: Arriba Arriba! One hit of our Pina Piñata, will send pure sweet orange and grapefruit essential oils flying to put you in a party mood!

fields.name: Soap 6
fields.description: A softening blend of body smoothing Oceanic soap and luxurious Eucalyptus and Tea Tree essential oils to leave you feeling fresh and moisturised.

fields.name: Liquid Soap 1
fields.description: Lay back, relax and embrace the zen of these bear necessities! Let the floral and juicy berried fragrances pull you into a bear hug as the pure essential oils splish and splash your troubles away.

fields.name: Liquid Soap 2
fields.description: Pucker up and enjoy sexy scents and softly seductive pink waters. Let the essential oils kiss your skin as you sink into the romance.

fields.name: Liquid Soap 3
fields.description: Blast into outer space amongst fruity, fun and warming scents as your orbit around pure essential oils and layers of fluffy blue and green waters.

fields.name: Liquid Soap 4
fields.description: Break up with stress and get to know our calming soap which contains essential oils designed to leave you feeling relaxed and in a lull.
